name: OneNightInHell: The Forgotten
description:
This game is a story based game, It's a squeal to the first game "One Night In Hell" Which was a free roaming AI based game where you needed to find a Exit, However in this game it's story line driv'in and you locate items to advance yourself along, here's the full story/background information.

STORY:

32 years ago, the hospital know as, ONIH Hospital had an infection break-out that caused the hospital to be abandoned as the air was far to contaminated. Patient 240 however is still there, his location in the building is unknown.. Last one who made it out alive described him as a 7 Foot Demon/Human hybrid that roams the building waiting.. As other people who were left behind in the evacuation became mutains half dead half alive or as some say, Zombie like they have no thoughts.. no emotions, The air isn't quite as bad as it was 30 years ago however it still has the ability to cause hallucinations and false thoughts. Sometimes you might see things that aren't there at all...
